item.title: [RBX/SBG][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Rancher Service maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 17, 08:30 - 17:00 UTC

Jan 6, 15:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Containers & Orchestration offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 17/02/2026 08:30 UTC
End time : 17/02/2026 17:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Ranchers in version 2.10 to version 2.11. You can already manage the upgrade by yourself through OVHcloud Control panel or API.
The Rancher compatibility matrix with downstream clusters will change, indeed K8S version 1.28 and 1.29 will no longer be officially supported.
For more information regarding Managed Rancher Service supported versions and lifecycle policy, you can visit this page: KB0064608

Thank you for your understanding.

Thank you for your understanding.
